briefTitle: A Trial of Camrelizumab Plus Nab-paclitaxel and Levocetirizine in Metastatic or Recurrent TNBC
officialTitle: Camrelizumab Plus Nab-paclitaxel and Anti-histamine Drug Levocetirizine in Metastatic or Recurrent Triple-negative Breast Cancer: a Randomized, Double-arm, Phase 2 Randomized Controlled Trial
